name: VR_EngineRoom
description:
This app is built using unity game engine and google cardboard. Engine was designed on SolidWorks where I employed my skills in modeling and followed existing models to complete the engine. Moreover animation was done on SolidWorks and imported to unity via external package added to SolidWorks

It is about an engine placed in a room and can be used to model the functionalities of a real engine. The project is under development. Parts are built using SolidWorks and rendering is on the way. 

The main aim is to integrate new immersive mode allowing to teach introductory mechanical course for students. The app will be tackling the four  strokes of ICE.

This is a simple prototype built on google cardboard. The project is under development and the final  version will include both oculus and google cardboard integration.
